messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom]  Guess who's celebrating a birthday...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/3/03 7:33:07 AM, nessapower@protelco.net writes:  Well for all his uptight English-ness, I m glad
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/3/03 7:33:07 AM, nessapower@... writes:

<< January 3rd, 1892 Tolkien was born. >>

Well for all his uptight English-ness, I'm glad he wrote what he wrote!!

Happy Birthday, father of Bilbo!

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom]  Guess who's celebrating a birthday...
messages.msgSnippet: I m mostly a lurker, but with all of the talk about the Lord of the Rings, thought you all would be interested in knowing that January 3rd, 1892 Tolkien was
messages.messageBody:
I'm mostly a lurker, but with all of the talk about the Lord of the Rings, thought you all would be interested in knowing that January 3rd, 1892 Tolkien was born.
I might have to start reading his stuff to the girls this month, you guys have got me pumped up with all the discussion on here.

Vanessa
Our lil' sweeties:
Victoria Rose, Madison Grace, and
David Kent

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
